messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

phone keeps logging me out and gets disconnected sent friday november phone keeps logging out gets disconnected hello could you please assist with above mentioned there might be issue with cables have changed phones still happens currently had move desks went break upon returning phone was allowing press any keys unplugged cable was then stuck waiting discovery changed phones other one was also stuck discovery previously advised issue might be with cables even if move phone centimeter disconnects thanks kind regards analyst
